How many people are affected by Peutz-Jeghers syndrome ?,"The prevalence of this condition is uncertain; estimates range from 1 in 25,000 to 300,000 individuals.",GHR,Peutz-Jeghers syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Peutz-Jeghers syndrome ?,"Mutations in the STK11 gene (also known as LKB1) c
